argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srgacl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | srgacl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_srgcmn | |- ( R e. SRing -> R e. CMnd ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_cmncom | |- ( ( R e. CMnd /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( R e. SRing /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) |
